reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Program Guide' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Program Guide' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Program Guide' check box is checked.
Enter 'Program Guide Example' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Program Guide Example' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Program Guide Example' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'Program Guide' from the 'Content' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The block settings have been updated.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Assert that the selected block 'Program Guide' contains the 'Content' text.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'Program Guide' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Program Guide dialog'.
Enter 'http://feed.entertainment.tv.theplatform.com/f/dCK2IC/stage_usa_listing?range=1-*&form=json' in the 'Data URL' text box.
Click the 'Save Configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Verify home page program guide contains text 'Program Guide'.
Verify column headers present of 'Date', 'Show', and 'Information'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify Cron Status contains data url 'http://feed.entertainment.tv.theplatform.com/f/dCK2IC/stage_usa_listing?range=1-*&form=json'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Verify home page program guide contains text 'Program Guide'.
Verify column headers present of 'Date', 'Show', and 'Information'.
After 8pm, show availability limited.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'Program Guide' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
